body_html: Discussed with @colesbury and we decided it was better to not complicate the THCCachingAllocator with an "allocate_on_device" function. I've removed that part of the PR; now this PR only removes the use of resize_ in at::empty
body_text: Discussed with @colesbury and we decided it was better to not complicate the THCCachingAllocator with an "allocate_on_device" function. I've removed that part of the PR; now this PR only removes the use of resize_ in at::empty
body: Discussed with @colesbury and we decided it was better to not complicate the THCCachingAllocator with an "allocate_on_device" function. I've removed that part of the PR; now this PR only removes the use of `resize_` in `at::empty`
